passwordHint: Bura 8 inyuguti, inyuguti nkuru imwe, umubare umwe

registrationSuccessMessage: Konti yawe yakozwe neza. Imeli y'inyishu yo kugirango wemeze konti yawe yarungitswe kuri {{email}}. Kanda ku murongo uri muri iyo imeli kugirango wemeze konti yawe.

verifyEmail.verifyingDesc: Turiko turagenzura aderesi yawe ya email. Ntibizotwara umwanya munini.
verifyEmail.successDesc2: yaremejwe. Ubu ushobora kwinjira kuri konti yawe.
verifyEmail.errorDesc: Iyo link yo kwemeza siyo canke yararangiye igihe.
verifyEmail.resendHint: Ushobora gusaba ko twohereza indi link yo kwemeza.
verifyEmail.invalidDesc: Iyo link yo kwemeza siyo canke ntiruzuye.
verifyEmail.footerNote: Raba no muri spam nimba utaronse email.

accountInactive: Konti yawe ntiraremezwa. Suzuma email yawe.
tooManyAttempts: Wagerageje kenshi cane. Subira ugerageze hanyuma.

verifyBanner.title: Intambwe ya nyuma — genzura amakuru yawe
verifyBanner.description: Soma kandi ushire akamenyetso kuri buri gasandugu kugira ngo wohereze ukwiyandikisha kwawe.

aboutCopaTitle: Ikibanza co kuronsa abikorera mu Burundi
aboutCopaDesc1: COPA ni igikorwa c'Umushinga PRETE, ushikirizwa n'Isoko ry'Isi. Intumbero yacu: kurondera, gufasha no gutanga inkunga ku bicuruzwa bikiri binini canke bitoyi mu Burundi bishoboye.
aboutCopaDesc2: COPA igamije abikorera bose, cane cane abakenyezi bikorera n'abahunze bifuza guteza imbere ibikorwa vyabo mu Burundi.
step1Desc: Ugire konti yawe maze uzuze amakuru yawe mu minota mikeyi.
step2Desc: Kurikira amahugurwa kubuntu kugira ngo ubone ubumenyi bukenewe bwo kwandika gahunda nziza.
step3Desc: Andika kandi utange gahunda yawe mbere y'umunsi w'impera. Abahinga bacu bazo isuzuma mu buryo bubereye.
step4Desc: Ni wahigwa, ronka inkunga n'ubufasha mu gutanguza umushinga wawe.
impactDesc: Ubushigikire bw'ibicuruzwa, inkunga zatanzwe n'akazi karenguwe.
testimonial1Text: Cokimuriwe na COPA, nabaye gushobora guhindura ubucuruzi bwanje butoyi mw'igicuruzwa gikomeye. Amahugurwa yampaye icizigiro n'inkunga yampaye kugura ibikoresho vya none. Ubu, ndakoresha abantu 5!
testimonial2Text: Mfashijwe na COPA, umushinga wanje wavuye mw'igitekerezo gusa wabaye igicuruzwa giteguruwe neza. Inama nahaye zampaye gushobora gutunganya imari yanje n'inkunga yoroheje kugura ibikoresho vy'ingenzi. Ubu, ndabikorera abakiriya benshi kandi naremye akazi 4!
testimonial3Text: Ubufasha bwa COPA bwamye ihindagurika rikomeye ku bucuruzi bwanje. Urufatiro rwampaye gushobora gutunganya imari yanje n'inkunga yampaye kwongereza ubushobozi bwanje. Ubu, amacuruzi yanje yaragwiyekanye kandi naremye akazi 4 mashasha!
blogTitle1: Imahere anyu arabanje? Gerageza aya majambo 10
blogDesc1: Ico ukoze mugutegura canke mugutwara, intumbero igomba kwibandwa kurufatiro.
blogTitle2: Urimo kwimura ibikorwa vyawe mu yandi mahanga?
blogDesc2: Uwubitsa ibikorwa agomba kwitaho ibibazo birenze uguhitamo gusa!
blogDesc3: Bishobora kuba ivyavuka canke ivy'inyongera, kandi ivyakurikiye birashobora gutangaza...
blogTitle4: Ni gute twakemura amakenga mu bakenge?
blogDesc4: Ico ukoze mugutegura canke mugutwara, intumbero igomba kwibandwa kurufatiro.
bannerDescription: Hindura igitekerezo cawe mu bucuruzi bukora. COPA ifasha ibicuruzwa bikiri binini canke bitoyi mu Burundi kwiga, kuronka ubufasha n'inkunga kugira ngo mushobore kugera ku ntego zanyu.
